games.description: Time your taps to smash through a tower of colorful blocks.

Cricket is a simple a mobile game representation of the sport cricket. This is a multiplayer iteration, where one user selects to bat, while the other throws the ball. The objective of the game is score the highest.
Create huge spirals by removing bark from trunks and use them to collect coins and destroy obstacles in your way.
Run and jump with Om Nom in this famous endless runner adventure.

Ludo is a strategy board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to the rolls of a single die. Like other cross and circle games, Ludo is derived from the Indian game Pachisi.
Train your brain! Can you connect all the matching tile pairs?
Pull out the pins and get all the aliens onto their spaceship.

images.description: Create huge spirals by removing bark from trunks and use them to collect coins and destroy obstacles in your way.

games.description: Draw your legs to win the race! Any drawing will make you run!
Race along the highway and shoot down all your enemies.
See how long you can survive by dodging and blasting the bouncing obstacles before they hit you!
Tap to jump into as many hoops as possible. Give it your best shot!
Tap and hold to increase your jump distance. Jump from platform to platform and see how far you can get without falling into the lake!
Test your snowboarding skills on the Northern Heights! Collect coins, customize your snowboarder, and unlock awesome acrobatic moves.
Dance to the beat in this Bollywood music themed rhythm runner game.
Devour other slimes to grow larger and avoid getting devoured yourself.

The Sword Hit is a game where you enjoy your throwing sword. In this game, youâ€™ll find a wooden board, the log with small wooden logs and knives. The trick is to throw your pointer/knife on the board where it gets stuck on it without hitting the hurdles.

Ludo is a strategy board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to the rolls of a single die. Like other cross and circle games, Ludo is derived from the Indian game Pachisi.

Cricket is a simple a mobile game representation of the sport cricket. This is a multiplayer iteration, where one user selects to bat, while the other throws the ball. The objective of the game is score the highest.
Greedy Monkey is an infinite runner game. The objective is to score the maximum by avoiding obstacles while rapidly racing up the tree.
Horizon Escape is an infinite runner game. The objective is to avoid objects.

The object of the game is to navigate one's game piece, according to die rolls, from the start (bottom square) to the finish (top square), helped by climbing ladders but hindered by falling down snakes. The game is a simple race based on sheer luck, and it is popular with young children.

Simple racing game, where users avoid obstacles while racing to the finish line. The SOLO mode provides the user with power-ups, while the multiplayer option allows the user to invite another to race together.

Digital rendition of the basketball sport, where you can race against time to score maximum baskets. The user can opt to either play against time, or invite another to play multiplayer in realtime against the other.
Tambola, also called Lotto, game of chance using cards on which there is a grid of numbers, a row of which constitutes a win when they have been chosen at random.
Quiz Battle is a simple game where the user has the option to answer trivia questions in SOLO mode, Multiplayer MODE and fastest fingers first.
A fun game where you have to jump from pillar to pillar. The objective is to jump from pillar to pillar without falling into the water.
Survive waves of orcs in this tower defence strategy game.
Move and stack the right color platforms and finally kick them to get a huge score boost in a satisfying way!
Perfect your skills and match tiles in this classic game of Mahjong Solitaire.
Match at least 3 of the same tiles to remove them.
A food management game where you play as a panda that just opened a brand new Pizza Parlor.
A battle royale game where you destroy all your enemies to be the last one standing.
Merge your heroes into more powerful units in this tower defense game!
Combine and upgrade Exploding Pirate Ships in a new tile merge game.
Break numbered blocks with your ball. The higher the number the more hits it takes.
Fulfill customer orders by grabbing the right sushi from the conveyer.
Defend your base from hordes of alien invaders with your strategic skills and arsenal of upgradable weapon towers.
Run your farm by tilling the soil, planting seeds, watering and harvesting.
Aim and pop bubbles in this adventurous bubble shooter game.
Compete in this classic Carrom board game
Tap the screen and move the bird as long as you can go.
Move from lane to lane, jump and slide in this endless runner game.
Battle enemies to survive the dungeon in this exciting puzzle adventure.
Manage your restaurant by training chefs and upgrading equipment. Earn more and more money to make the best restaurant around in this idle clicker.
Play match 3 to entice a variety of cuddly kittens to visit your yard.
Quickly sort items and place them in boxes in this speed based matching game.
Earn coins by caring for and playing mini-games with your space pet. Dress it up in a wide variety of outfits and accessories!
Ahoy ye matey! Come take a deep dive into Pirate Pop and play through treasure-filled levels in a new bubble shooter game.
Slice the cakes and avoid the bombs in this arcade food slicing game.
Smash a colored ball into matching colored sections of rings in this increasingly difficult action game.
Draw the path to the matching light pairs and connect them together in this Diwali themed game.
Game is based on Ram and Ravan war. You have to fight with some devils before figting with Ravan. Kill the Ravan to win the game.
How many pieces can you fit in the grid in this addicting block puzzle game?
Put your brain to the test in this brain training game
Look at the two photos which seem identical and try to find the 5 differences.
Relax and enjoy solving beautiful jigsaw puzzles.
Unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way.

Tic Tac Toe is a simple two player game played on a 3x3 grid. The players take turns marking the spaces in the grid with X's and O's. The first one to get three of their marks in a line (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game. If all spaces on the grid are filled and no one has three marks in a row, the tic tac toe games are a draw.
Work out your mental muscles in this 3D puzzle match game.
Match at least 3 of the same tiles to remove them.
Create huge spirals by removing bark from trunks and use them to collect coins and destroy obstacles in your way.
Spin the wheel. A question will be appear related to category where wheel stops. Answer all the questions correctly to score more.
Play the classic sports game of 8-ball pool.
Compete in archery tournaments to become the World Archery Champion.
How many goals can you score against the goalkeeper?
Take turns propelling your players into the soccer ball in order to score a goal.
Play mini-golf across a variety of unique environments each with different gravities, obstacles and challenges.
Tap to drift, collect rewards, and upgrade your car!
The ultimate high-speed street. racing experience.
Ride your scooter and pull of extreme jumps and flips in this racing game.
The classic two-player card game! Can you defeat all 5 opponents?
A Klondike Solitaire game that features different challenges each day!
Clear the board to grow your garden by finding adjacent cards in this spin on Tripeaks Solitaire.

A game played between ancient Indian royal families. The game is won by rolling the dice to reach the center of the board. The player who reaches the center of the board before the other players is the winner.

It's Christmas season and Santa is out to deliver gifts. Help him to drop the gifts in chimney.
